entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late in the evening then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
